subtests.name: Selection's range must initially be null
getSelection() on HTML document with null defaultView must be null
getSelection() on XML document with null defaultView must be null
window.getSelection() instanceof Selection in an iframe onload
document.getSelection() instanceof Selection in an iframe onload
window.getSelection() === document.getSelection() in an iframe onload
getSelection() inside and outside iframe must return different objects onload
getSelection() on HTML document with null defaultView must be null inside an iframe onload
window.getSelection() instanceof Selection in an iframe immediately after appendChild
document.getSelection() instanceof Selection in an iframe immediately after appendChild
window.getSelection() === document.getSelection() in an iframe immediately after appendChild
getSelection() inside and outside iframe must return different objects immediately after appendChild
getSelection() on HTML document with null defaultView must be null inside an iframe immediately after appendChild
